content:
something i just remembered is that rustdoc recently gained an --index-page flag that allows you to provide an "index page" that sits in the top-level directory of a doc bundle (where there is currently no index.html placed by default)

it may be useful to add a small thing here that links to the crate docs as well as rustc-guide (and maybe other resources) so linking to https://doc.rust-lang.org/nightly/nightly-rustc is useful (it currently 404's)
